original: Namo tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa
analyzed: namaḥ tassa bhagavataḥ arahataḥ sammāsambuddhassa

original: Saṃyuttanikāye
analyzed: saṃyutta nikāye

original: Khandhavaggaṭīkā
1. Khandhasaṃyuttaṃ
analyzed: khandha saṃyuttam

original: 1. Nakulapituvaggo
analyzed: nakula pitu vaggo

original: 1. Nakulapitusuttavaṇṇanā
analyzed: nakula pitu sutta vaṇṇanā

original: 1. Bhaggā nāma jānapadino rājakumārā. Tesaṃ nivāso ekopi janapado ruḷhīvasena “bhaggā”tveva
analyzed: bhaggāḥ nāma jānapadinaḥ rāja kumārā tesam nivāsaḥ ekaḥ api janapadaḥ ruḷhī vasena

original: vuccatīti katvā vuttaṃ “evaṃnāmake janapade”ti, evaṃ bahuvacanavasena laddhanāme”ti
analyzed: vuccati iti katvā vuttam evaṃnāmake janapade iti evam bahuvacana vasena laddha nāmā iti

original: attho. Tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍeti yo pana vanasaṇḍo pubbe migānaṃ abhayatthāya dinno, tasmiṃ
analyzed: atthaḥ tasmim vana saṇḍe iti yaḥ pana vana saṇḍaḥ pubbe migānam abhaya tthāya dinnaḥ tasmim

original: vanasaṇḍe. Yasmā so gahapati tasmiṃ nagare “nakulapitā”ti puttassa vasena paññāyittha,
analyzed: vanasaṇḍe saḥ gahapati tasmim nagare nakula pitā ati puttassa vasena paññāyittha

original: tasmā vuttaṃ “nakulapitā”ti nakulassa nāma dārakassa pitāti attho. Bhariyāpissa “nakulamātā”ti paññāyittha.
analyzed: tasmā vuttam nakula pitā ti nakulassa nāma dārakassa pitā ati atthaḥ bhariyā apissa nakula mātā iti paññāyittha

original: Jarājiṇṇoti jarāvasena jiṇṇo, na byādhiādīnaṃ vasena jiṇṇo. Vayovuḍḍhoti jiṇṇattā
analyzed: jarā jiṇṇaḥ iti jarā vasena jiṇṇaḥ na byādhi ādīnam vasena jiṇṇaḥ vayaḥ vuḍḍhaḥ ti jiṇṇa ttā

original: eva vayovuḍḍhippattiyā vuḍḍho, na sīlādivuḍḍhiyā. Jātiyā mahantatāya cirarattatāya
analyzed: eva vayaḥ vuḍḍhi ppattiyā vuḍḍhaḥ na sīla ādi vuḍḍhiyā jātiyā mahantatāya cira ratta tāya

original: jātimahallako. Tiyaddhagatoti paṭhamo majjhimo pacchimoti tayo addhe gato. Tattha
analyzed: jāti mahallako tiya ddha gato ti paṭhamaḥ majjhimo pacchimo ti tayo addhe gato tattha

original: paṭhamaṃ dutiyañca atikkantattā pacchimaṃ upagatattā vayoanuppatto. Āturakāyoti dukkhavedanāpavisatāya
analyzed: paṭhamam dutiyam ca atikkanta ttā pacchimam upagata ttā vayaḥ anuppatto ātura kāyo ti dukkha vedanā pavisa tāya

original: anassādakāyo. Gelaññaṃ pana dukkhagatikanti “gilānakāyo”ti vuttaṃ. Tathā hi saccavibhaṅge
analyzed: anassāda kāyaḥ gelaññam pana dukkha gatikanti gilāna kāyaḥ ti vuttam tathā hi sacca vibhaṅge

original: dukkhasaccaniddese dukkhaggahaṇeneva gahitattā byādhi na niddiṭṭho. Niccapaggharaṇaṭṭhenāti
analyzed: dukkha sacca niddese dukkha ggahaṇena iva gahita ttā na niddiṭṭhaḥ nicca paggharaṇa ṭṭhena ati

original: sabbadā asucipaggharaṇabhāvena. So panassa āturabhāvenāti āha – “āturaṃyeva nāmā”ti.
analyzed: sabbadā asuci paggharaṇa bhāvena so pana assa ātura bhāvena ati āha nāma ati

original: Visesenāti adhikabhāvena. Āturatīti āturo. Saṅgāmappatto santattakāyo. Jarāya āturatā
analyzed: visesena ati adhika bhāvena āturati iti āturaḥ saṅgāma patto santatta kāyaḥ jarāya ātura tā

original: jarāturatā. Kusalapakkhavaḍḍhanena mano bhāventīti manobhāvanīyā. Manasā vā bhāvanīyā
analyzed: jarā ātura tā kusala pakkha vaḍḍhanena manaḥ bhāventi iti manaḥ bhāvanīyā manasā vā bhāvanīyā

original: sambhāvanīyāti manobhāvanīyā. Anusāsatūti anu anu sāsatūti ayamettha atthoti āha
analyzed: sambhāvanīyā ati manaḥ bhāvanīyā anusāsatu uti anu anu sāsatu uti ayam ettha atthaḥ ti āha

original: – “punappunaṃ sāsatū”ti. Aparāparaṃ pavattitaṃ hitavacanaṃ. Anotiṇṇe vatthusmiṃ yo
analyzed: punappunam sāsatu iti apara aparam hita vacanam anotiṇṇe vatthusmim yaḥ

original: evaṃ karoti, tassa ayaṃ guṇo dosoti vacanaṃ. Tantivasenāti tantisannissayena ayaṃ
analyzed: evam karoti tassa ayam guṇaḥ doso ti vacanam tanti vasena ati tanti sannissayena ayam

original: anusāsanī nāma. Paveṇīti tantiyā eva vevacanaṃ.
analyzed: anusāsanī nāma paveṇī iti tantiyāḥ eva vevacanam

original: Aṇḍaṃ viya bhūtoti adhikopamā kāyassa aṇḍakosato abaladubbalabhāvato. Tenāha “aṇḍaṃ hī”tiādi. Bāloyeva tādisattabhāvasamaṅgī muhuttampi ārogyaṃ paṭijānanto.
analyzed: aṇḍam viya bhūtaḥ ti adhikā upamā kāyassa aṇḍa kosataḥ abala dubbala bhāvataḥ tena āha aṇḍam hi itiādi tādi satta bhāva samaṅgī muhuttam pi ārogyam paṭijānanto

original: Vippasannānīti pakatimākāraṃ atikkamitvā visesena pasannāni. Tenāha – “suu pasannānī”ti.
analyzed: vippasannāni iti pakatim ākāram atikkamitvā visesena pasannāni tena āha

original: Pasannacittasamuṭṭhitarūpasampadāhi tāhi tassa mukhavaṇṇassa pārisuddhīti āha – “parisuddhoti
analyzed: pasanna citta samuṭṭhita rūpa sampadāhi tāhi tassa mukha vaṇṇassa pārisuddhī iti āha parisuddhaḥ ti

original: niddoso”ti. Tenevāha “nirupakkilesatāyā”tiādi. Etenevassindriyavippasannatākāraṇampi
analyzed: niddoso ti tena iva āha nirupakkilesa tāya atiādi

original: saṃvaṇṇitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Esa mukhavaṇṇo. Nayaggāhapaññā kiresāti idaṃ anāvajjanavaseneva
analyzed: saṃvaṇṇitanti daṭṭhabbam esa mukha vaṇṇaḥ naya ggāha paññā kiresa ati idam an āvajjana vasena iva

original: vuttabhāvaṃ sandhāyāha.
analyzed: vutta bhāvam sandhāya āha

original: Yaṃ neva puttassātiādi “ovadatu no, bhante, bhagavā yathā mayaṃ paralokepi aññamaññaṃ
analyzed: yam na iva puttassa atiādi ovadatu naḥ bhante bhagavā yathā mayam para loke pi aññam aññam

original: samāgaccheyyāmā”ti vuttavacanaṃ sandhāya vuttameva. Madhuradhammadesanāyeva satthu
analyzed: samāgaccheyyāma iti vutta vacanam sandhāya vuttam eva madhura dhamma desanāya iva satthu

original: sammukhā paṭiladdhā, tassa attano pemagāravagahitattā “amatābhiseko”ti veditabbo.
analyzed: sammukhā paṭiladdhā tassa attano amata abhisekaḥ iti veditabbo

original: Idaṃ padadvayaṃ. Ārakattā kilesehi maggena samucchinnattā. Anayeti avaḍḍhiyaṃ, anattheti
analyzed: idam pada dvayam āraka ttā kilesehi maggena samucchinna ttā anayā iti avaḍḍhiyam anattha iti

original: attho. Anaye vā anupāye. Na iriyanato avattanato. Ayeti vaḍḍhiyaṃ atthe upāye ca.
analyzed: atthaḥ anaye vā anupāye na iriyanataḥ avattanataḥ vaḍḍhiyam atthe upāye ca

original: Araṇīyatoti payirupāsitabbato. Niruttinayena padasiddhi veditabbā purimesu atthavikappesu,
analyzed: araṇīyataḥ iti nirutti nayena pada siddhi veditabbā purimesu attha vikappesu

original: pacchime pana saddasatthavasenapi. Yadipi ariyasaddo “ye hi vo ariyā parisuddhakāyakammantā”tiādīsu
analyzed: pacchime pana sadda sattha vasena api yadi pi ariya saddaḥ ye hi vaḥ ariyā parisuddha kāya kammantā ati ādīsu

original: visuddhāsayapayogesu puthujjanesupi vaṭṭati, idha pana ariyamaggādhigamena sabbalokuttarabhāvena
analyzed: visuddha āsaya payogesu puthujjanesu pi vaṭṭati idha pana ariya magga adhigamena sabba lokuttara bhāvena

original: ca ariyabhāvo adhippetoti dassento āha – “buddhā cā”tiādi. Tattha paccekabuddhā tathāgatasāvakā
analyzed: ca ariya bhāvaḥ adhippetaḥ ti dassentaḥ āha buddhā ca atiādi tattha paccekabuddhā tathāgata sāvakā

original: ca sappurisāti idaṃ “ariyā sappurisā”ti idha vuttapadānaṃ atthaṃ asaṅkarato dassetuṃ
analyzed: ca sappurisā ti idam ariyā sappurisā ti idha vutta padānam attham asaṅkarataḥ dassetuṃ

original: vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana nippariyāyato ariyasappurisabhāvā abhinnasabhāvā, tasmā “sabbeva vā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: vuttam yasmā pana nippariyāyataḥ ariya sappurisa bhāvā abhinna sabhāvā tasmā sabbā iva vā tiādi vuttam

original: Ettāvatā hi buddhasāvako vutto, tassa hi ekantena kalyāṇamitto icchitabbo parato
analyzed: ettāvatā hi buddha sāvakaḥ vuttaḥ tassa hi ekantena kalyāṇa mitto icchitabbo paratas

original: ghosamantarena paṭhamamaggassa anuppajjanato. Visesato cassa bhagavāva “kalyāṇamitto”ti
analyzed: ghosam antarena paṭhama maggassa anuppajjanato visesato ca ssa bhagavā ava kalyāṇa mittaḥ ti

original: adhippeto. Vuttañhetaṃ “mamañhi, ānanda, kalyāṇamittaṃ āgamma jātidhammā sattā jātiyā
analyzed: adhippetaḥ vuttam ha etam maman hi ānanda kalyāṇa mittam āgamma jāti dhammāḥ sattāḥ jātiyā

original: parimuccantī”tiādi. So eva ca aveccapasādādhigamena daḷhabhatti nāma. Vuttampi cetaṃ
analyzed: parimuccanti itiādi saḥ eva ca avecca pasāda adhigamena daḷhabhatti nāma

original: “yaṃ mayā sāvakānaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ paññattaṃ, taṃ mama sāvakā jīvitahetupi nātikkamantī”ti.
analyzed: yam mayā sāvakānam sikkhāpadam paññattam tam mama sāvakāḥ jīvita hetu pi na atikkamanti iti

original: Kataññutādīhi paccekabuddhabuddhāti ettha kataṃ jānātīti kataññū. Kataṃ viditaṃ pākaṭaṃ
analyzed: kataññu tā ādīhi paccekabuddha buddha ati ettha katam jānāti iti kataññū katam viditam pākaṭam

original: karotīti katavedī. Paccekabuddhā hi anekesupi kappasatasahassesu kataṃ upakāraṃ jānanti,
analyzed: karoti iti kata vedī paccekabuddhāḥ hi anekesu pi kappa sata sahassesu katam upakāram jānanti

original: katañca pākaṭaṃ karonti satijananaāmisapaṭiggahaṇādinā. Tathā saṃsāradukkhadukkhitassa
analyzed: katam ca pākaṭam karonti sati janana āmisa paṭiggahaṇa ādinā tathā saṃsāra dukkha dukkhitassa

original: sakkaccaṃ karonti kiccaṃ, yaṃ attanā kātuṃ sakkā. Sammāsambuddho pana kappānaṃ asaṅkhyeyyasahassesupi
analyzed: sakkaccam karonti kiccam yam attanā kātum sakkā sammāsambuddhaḥ pana kappānam asaṅkhyeyya sahassesu pi

original: kataṃ upakāraṃ maggaphalānaṃ upanissayañca jānanti, pākaṭañca karonti. Sīho viya
analyzed: katam upakāram magga phalānam upanissayam ca jānanti pākaṭam ca karonti sīhaḥ viya

original: ca evaṃ sabbattha sakkaccameva dhammadesanaṃ karontena buddhakiccaṃ karonti. Yāya
analyzed: ca evam sabbattha sakkaccam eva dhamma desanam karontena buddha kiccam karonti

original: paṭipattiyā ariyā diṭṭhā nāma honti, tassā appaṭipajjanaṃ, tattha ca ādarābhāvo ariyānaṃ
analyzed: paṭipattiyā ariyāḥ diṭṭhāḥ nāma honti tassāḥ appaṭipajjanam tattha ca ādara abhāvaḥ ariyānaṃ

original: adassanasīlatā, na ca dassane sādhukāritāti veditabbā. Cakkhunā adassāvīti ettha
analyzed: a dassana sīla tā na ca dassane sādhu kāri tā ati veditabbā cakkhunā a dassāvī iti ettha

original: cakkhu nāma na maṃsacakkhu eva, atha kho dibbacakkhupīti āha “dibbacakkhunā vā”ti.
analyzed: cakkhu nāma na maṃsa cakkhu eva atha kho āha dibba cakkhunā vā ati

original: Ariyabhāvoti yehi yogato “ariyā”ti vuccanti, te maggaphaladhammā daṭṭhabbā.
analyzed: ariya bhāvo ti yehi yogataḥ ariyā ati vuccanti te magga phala dhammāḥ daṭṭhabbā

original: Tatrāti ñāṇadassanasseva dassanabhāve. Vatthūti adhippetatthañāpanakāraṇaṃ. Evaṃ
analyzed: tatra ati ñāṇa dassanassa iva dassana bhāve vatthu uti adhippeta ttha ñāpana kāraṇam evam

original: vuttepīti evaṃ aññāpadesena attupanāyikaṃ katvā vuttepi. Dhammanti lokuttaradhammaṃ,
analyzed: vutte pi iti evam añña apadesena attupanāyikam katvā vutte pi dhammam ti lokuttara dhammam

original: catusaccadhammaṃ vā. Ariyakaradhammā aniccānupassanādayo, vipassiyamānā vā aniccādayo,
analyzed: catu sacca dhammam vā ariya kara dhammāḥ anicca anupassana ādayaḥ vipassiyamānāḥ vā anicca ādayaḥ

original: cattāri vā ariyasaccāni.
analyzed: cattāri vā ariya saccāni

original: Avinītoti na vinīto adhisīlasikkhādīnaṃ vasena na sikkhito. Yesaṃ saṃvaravinayādīnaṃ
analyzed: avinītaḥ ti na vinītaḥ adhi sīla sikkhā ādīnam vasena na sikkhitaḥ yesam saṃvara vinaya ādīnam

original: abhāvena ayaṃ “avinīto”ti vuccati, te tāva dassetuṃ “duvidho vinayo nāmā”tiādimāha.
analyzed: abhāvena ayam avinītaḥ ti vuccati te tāva dassetum duvidhaḥ vinayaḥ nāma ati ādim āha

original: Tattha sīlasaṃvaroti pātimokkhasaṃvaro veditabbo, so ca atthato kāyikavācasiko avītikkamo.
analyzed: tattha sīla saṃvaro ti pātimokkha saṃvaraḥ veditabbo saḥ ca atthataḥ kāyika vācasikaḥ avītikkamaḥ

original: Satisaṃvaroti indriyārakkhā, sā ca tathāpavattā satiyeva. Ñāṇasaṃvaroti “sotānaṃ
analyzed: sati saṃvaroti indriya ārakkhā sā ca tathā pavattā satiyā iva ñāṇa saṃvaroti

original: saṃvaraṃ brūmī”ti vatvā “paññāyete pidhīyare”ti vacanato sotasaṅkhātānaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhiduccaritaavijjāavasiṭṭhakilesānaṃ
analyzed: saṃvaram brūmi iti vatvā paññāyete vacanato sota saṅkhātānam taṇhā diṭṭhi duccarita avijjā avasiṭṭha kilesānam

original: saṃvaro pidahanaṃ samucchedañāṇanti veditabbaṃ. Khantisaṃvaroti adhivāsanā, sā ca
analyzed: saṃvaraḥ pidahanam samuccheda ñāṇan ti veditabbam khanti saṃvarā ti adhivāsanā sā ca

original: tathāpavattā khandhā, adoso vā, “paññā”ti keci vadanti. Vīriyasaṃvaro kāmavitakkādīnaṃ
analyzed: tathā pavattā khandhā adosaḥ vā paññā ti keci vadanti vīriya saṃvaro kāma vitakka ādīnam

original: vinodanavasena pavattaṃ vīriyameva. Tena tena aṅgena tassa tassa aṅgassa pahānaṃ
analyzed: vinodana vasena pavattam vīriyam eva tena tena aṅgena tassa tassa aṅgassa pahānam

original: tadaṅgappahānaṃ. Vikkhambhanavasena pahānaṃ vikkhambhanappahānaṃ. Sesapadattayepi eseva nayo.
analyzed: tad aṅga ppahānam vikkhambhana vasena pahānam vikkhambhana ppahānam sesa pada ttaye pi esa iva nayaḥ

original: Iminā pātimokkhasaṃvarenātiādi sīlasaṃvarādīnaṃ vivaraṇaṃ. Tattha samupetoti iti-saddo
analyzed: iminā pātimokkha saṃvarena ati ādi sīla saṃvara ādīnam vivaraṇam tattha samupetaḥ ti iti saddaḥ

original: ādiattho. Tena “upagato”tiādinā vibhaṅge āgataṃ saṃvaravibhaṅgaṃ dasseti. Kāyaduccaritādīnanti
analyzed: ādi atthaḥ tena upagataḥ iti ādinā vibhaṅge āgatam saṃvara vibhaṅgam dasseti

original: dussīlyasaṅkhātānaṃ kāyavacīduccaritādīnaṃ muṭṭhasaccasaṅkhātassa pamādassa, abhijjhādīnaṃ
analyzed: dussīlya saṅkhātānam kāya vacī duccarita ādīnam muṭṭha sacca saṅkhātassa pamādassa abhijjhā ādīnam

original: vā akkhantiaññāṇakosajjānañca. Saṃvaraṇatoti pidahanato, vinayanatoti kāyavācācittānaṃ
analyzed: vā akkhanti aññāṇa kosajjānam ca saṃvaraṇataḥ uti pidahanataḥ vinayanataḥ uti kāya vācā cittānam

original: virūpapavattiyā vinayanato, kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ vā apanayanato, kāyādīnaṃ vā jimhapavattiṃ
analyzed: virūpa pavattiyāḥ vinayanataḥ kāya duccarita ādīnam vā apanayanataḥ kāya ādīnam vā jimha pavattim

original: vicchinditvā ujukanayanatoti attho. Paccayasamavāye uppajjanārahānaṃ kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ
analyzed: vicchinditvā ujuka nayanato ti attho paccaya samavāye uppajjana arahānam kāya duccarita ādīnam

original: tathā tathā anuppādanameva saṃvaraṇaṃ vinayanañca veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: tathā tathā an uppādanam eva saṃvaraṇam vinayanam ca veditabbam

original: Yaṃ pahānanti sambandho. “Nāmarūpaparicchedādīsu vipassanāñāṇesū”ti kasmā vuttaṃ?
analyzed: yam pahānan ti sambandhaḥ nāma rūpa pariccheda ādīsu vipassanā ñāṇesu iti kasmā vuttam

original: Nanu nāmarūpaparicchedapaccayapariggahakaṅkhāvitaraṇāni na vipassanāñāṇāni sammasanākārena
analyzed: nanu nāma rūpa pariccheda paccaya pariggaha kaṅkhā vitaraṇāni na vipassanā ñāṇāni sammasana ākārena

original: appavattanato? Saccametaṃ, vipassanāñāṇassa pana adhiṭṭhānabhāvato evaṃ vuttaṃ. Nāmarūpamattamidaṃ,
analyzed: a pavattanato saccam etam vipassanā ñāṇassa pana adhiṭṭhāna bhāvataḥ evam vuttam nāma rūpa mattam idam

original: “natthi ettha attā vā attaniyaṃ vā”ti evaṃ pavattañāṇaṃ nāmarūpavavatthānaṃ. Sati
analyzed: natthi ettha attā vā attaniyam vā ati evam pavatta ñāṇam nāma rūpa vavatthānam sati

original: vijjamāne khandhapañcakasaṅkhāte kāye, sayaṃ vā satī tasmiṃ kāye diṭṭhi sakkāyadiṭṭhi,
analyzed: vijjamāne khandha pañcaka saṅkhāte kāye sayam vā satī tasmin kāye diṭṭhi sakkāyadiṭṭhi

original: sā ca “rūpaṃ attato samanupassatī”ti evaṃ pavattā attadiṭṭhi. Tassa nāmarūpassa kammāvijjādipaccayapariggaṇhanañāṇaṃ
analyzed: sā ca rūpam attataḥ samanupassati iti evam pavattā atta diṭṭhi tassa nāma rūpassa kamma avijja ādi paccaya pariggaṇhana ñāṇam

original: paccayapariggaho. “Natthi hetu, natthi paccayo sattānaṃ saṃkilesāyā”tiādinayappavattā
analyzed: paccaya pariggahaḥ natthi hetu natthi paccayaḥ sattānam saṃkilesāya ati ādi naya ppavattā

original: ahetudiṭṭhi. “Issarapurisapajāpatipakatiaṇukālādīhi loko pavattati nivattati cā”ti

original: Tenāha “sītenapī”tiādi. Pabbatapādeti cakkavāḷapabbatapāde, so pana tattha accuggato

original: Avīcimahānirayeti saussadaṃ avīcinirayaṃ vuttaṃ. Gaṅgāpiṭṭheti gaṅgātīre.

original: tasseva vevacanāni. Abhisaṅkharaṇameva hi āyūhanādīni. Nibbattetīti tesaṃ dhammānaṃ

analyzed: saṅkhāra kkhandham vibhajantena cetanā u vibhattā

original: ca. Vināpi ākārasaṇṭhānāti ākārasaṇṭhānehi vinā, te ṭhapetvāpi. Paccattabhedagahaṇavasenāti

original: tato manasā anuvicaritañca nīharitvā dassetuṃ “lokasmiṃ hī”tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha pariyesitvā

original: Etaṃmamasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: etaṃmamasutta ādi vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

analyzed: dinnanti deyya dhamma sīsena dānam vuttanti āha dinnassa phala abhāvam sandhāya iti

original: Mahāyāgoti sabbasādhāraṇaṃ mahādānaṃ. Paheṇakasakkāroti pāhunakānaṃ kātabbasakkāro.

original: ayaṃ loko natthīti paraloke ṭhitassa kammunā laddhabbo ayaṃ loko na hoti. Idhaloke

original: ṭhitassapi paraloko natthīti idhaloke ṭhitassa kammunā laddhabbo paraloko na hoti.

original: Tattha kāraṇamāha – “sabbe tattha tattheva ucchijjantī”ti. Ime sattā yattha yattha
analyzed: tattha kāraṇam āha sabbe tattha tattha iva ucchijjanti iti ime sattāḥ yattha yattha

original: Kiñhi paro parassa karissati, tathā ca attano sampādanassa kassaci avassayo eva na

original: Catūsu mahābhūtesu niyuttoti cātumahābhūtiko. Yathā pana mattikāya nibbattaṃ bhājanaṃ

original: Anuyātīti tassa anurūpabhāvena yāti upeti. Upagacchatīti pubbe bāhirapathavīkāyato

analyzed: natthidinna sutta vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 6. Karotosuttavaṇṇanā
analyzed: karoto sutta vaṇṇanā

original: “hanantassapi hanāpentassapī”ti. Kāraṇavasenāti kārāpanavasena.

213-215. Akatāti samena vā visamena vā kenaci hetunā na katā eva. Kenaci kataṃ karaṇaṃ

322-331. Esoti cakkhusmiṃ chandarāgo. Upecca kilesetīti upakkileso. Cittassāti sāmaññavacanaṃ

original: jānitvā. Sacchikātabbesūti paccakkhakātabbesu. Chaḷabhiññādhammesūti ariyamaggasampayuttadhammesu.

analyzed: tasmim vacane paṭikkhittā iti adhomukhaḥ bhuñjasi iti paribbājikāya vutta vacane

original: – “na khvāhaṃ bhaginī”ti paṭikkhitte. Vādanti dosaṃ. Ubbhamukhoti uparimukho. Puratthimādikā

original: tassā pana micchājīvabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ “tesa”ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tesaṃ tesaṃ attano paccayadāyakānaṃ.
analyzed: tassā pana micchājīva bhāvam dassetum tesam ti ādi vuttam tesam tesam attanaḥ paccaya dāyakānam

original: Tattha tattha gamananti tesaṃ sāsanaharaṇavasena taṃ taṃ gāmantaradesantaraṃ. Evamārocesīti
analyzed: tattha tattha gamanam ti tesam sāsana haraṇa vasena tam tam gām antara desa antaram evam ārocesi iti

original: attukkaṃsanaparavambhanarahitaṃ kaṇṇasukhaṃ pemanīyaṃ hadayaṅgamaṃ therassa dhammakathaṃ

original: pāvuraṇaṃ. Yānti tenāti yānaṃ, upāhanādiyānāni. Ādisaddena vayhasivikādīnaṃ saṅgaho.

original: Chattampi parissayātapadukkhaparirakkhaṇena maggagamanasādhananti katvā “chattupāhana”ntiādi

original: 9. Supaṇṇasaṃyuttavaṇṇanā
392-437. Pattānanti ubhosu pakkhesu pattānaṃ. Vaṇṇavantatāyāti atisayena vicittavaṇṇatāya.
analyzed: pattānam ti ubhosu pakkhesu pattānam vaṇṇavanta tāya ati atisayena vicitta vaṇṇa tāya

original: Atisayattho hi ayaṃ vanta-saddo. Purimanayenāti nāgasaṃyutte paṭhamasutte vuttanayena.
analyzed: ati saya atthaḥ hi ayam vanta saddo purima nayena ati nāga saṃyutte paṭhama sutte vutta nayena

original: Uddharantīti samuddato uddharanti, pathavantarapabbatantarato pana tesaṃ uddharaṇaṃ
analyzed: uddharanti iti samuddataḥ uddharanti pathavantara pabbata antarataḥ pana tesam uddharaṇam

original: dukkarameva. Paṇītatareti balena paṇītatare, balavanteti attho. Anuddharaṇīyanāgāti

original: ānubhāvamahantatāya ca vasanaṭṭhānaviduggatāya ca uddharituṃ asakkuṇeyyā nāgā. Te
analyzed: ānubhāva mahanta tāya ca vasanaṭṭhāna viduggatāya ca uddharitum a sakkuṇeyyāḥ nāgā te

original: “sattavidhā”ti vatvā sarūpato vasanaṭṭhānato ca dassento “kambalassatarā”tiādimāha.

original: Tattha kambalassatarā dhataraṭṭhāti ime jātivasena vuttā. Sattasīdantaravāsinoti
analyzed: tattha kambalassatarā dhataraṭṭhā ti ime jāti vasena vuttā

original: sattavidhasīdasamuddavāsino. Pathaviṭṭhakāti pathavantaravāsino, tathā pabbataṭṭhakā.
analyzed: sattavidha sīda samudda vāsinaḥ pathaviṭṭhakā ati pathavantara vāsinaḥ tathā pabbataṭṭhakā

original: Te ca vimānavāsino. Te nāge koci supaṇṇo uddharituṃ na sakkotīti sambandho. Sesanti
analyzed: te ca vimāna vāsinaḥ te nāge koci su paṇṇaḥ uddharitum na sakkoti iti sambandhaḥ

original: “kāyena dvayakārino”tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ nāgasaṃyutte vuttanayameva,

original: tattha ca vuttanayeneva attho veditabboti adhippāyo.
analyzed: tattha ca vutta nayena iva atthaḥ veditabbaḥ ti adhippāyaḥ

original: Supaṇṇasaṃyuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: supaṇṇa saṃyutta vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 10. Gandhabbakāyasaṃyuttavaṇṇanā
438-549. Mūlagandhādibhedaṃ gandhaṃ avanti apayuñjantīti gandhabbā, tesaṃ kāyo samūho
analyzed: mūla gandha ādi bhedam gandham avanti apayuñjanti iti gandhabbā tesam kāyaḥ samūhaḥ

original: gandhabbakāyo, gandhabbadevanikāyo. Cātumahārājikesu ekiyāva te daṭṭhabbā, tappariyāpannatāya
analyzed: gandhabba kāyaḥ gandhabba devanikāyo cātumahārājikesu ekiyā ava te daṭṭhabbā tad pariyāpanna tāya

original: tattha vā niyuttāti gandhabbakāyikā. Tesaṃ tesaṃ rukkhagacchalatānaṃ mūlaṃ paṭicca
analyzed: tattha vā niyuttā ati gandhabba kāyikā tesam tesam rukkhagaccha latānam mūlam paṭicca

original: pavatto gandho mūlagandho, tasmiṃ mūlagandhe. Adhivatthāti mūlagandhaṃ adhiṭṭhāya,
analyzed: pavattaḥ gandhaḥ mūla gandhaḥ tasmin mūla gandhe adhivattha ati mūla gandham adhiṭṭhāya

original: abhibhuyya vā vasantā. Esa nayo sesesupi. Taṃ nissāyāti taṃ mūlagandhaṃ rukkhaṃ paccayaṃ
analyzed: abhibhuyya vā vasantā esa nayo sesesu pi tam nissāya ati tam mūla gandham rukkham paccayam

original: katvā nibbattā. Na kevalaṃ tattha gandho eva, mūlameva vā tesaṃ paccayoti dassento
analyzed: katvā nibbattā na kevalam tattha gandhaḥ eva mūlam eva vā tesam paccayaḥ ti dassento

original: “so hī”tiādimāha. Upakappatīti nivāsaṭṭhānabhāvena viniyuñjati. Gandhagandheti gandhānaṃ
analyzed: saḥ hi itiādim āha upakappati iti nivāsa ṭṭhāna bhāvena viniyuñjati gandha gandha iti

original: gandhasamudāye. Mūlādigandhānaṃ gandheti mūlādigataavayavagandhānaṃ gandhe, timūlādigatasamudāyabhūteti
analyzed: gandha samudāye mūla ādi gandhānam gandha iti mūla ādi gata avayava gandhānam gandhe ti mūla ādi gata samudāya bhūta iti

original: attho. Pubbe hi “mūlagandhe”tiādinā rukkhānaṃ avayavagandho gahito, idha pana sabbaso
analyzed: atthaḥ pubbe hi mūla gandha iti ādinā rukkhānam avayava gandho gahitaḥ idha pana sabbaso

original: gahitattā samudāyagandho veditabbo. Tenāha “yassa hi rukkhassā”tiādi. Soti so sabbo
analyzed: gahita ttā samudāya gandhaḥ veditabbo tena āha yassa hi rukkhassa atiādi saḥ ti so sabbo

original: mūlādigato gandho gandhasamudāyo idha gandhagandho nāma. Tassa gandhassa gandheti
analyzed: mūla ādi gataḥ gandhaḥ gandha samudāyaḥ gandha gandhaḥ nāma tassa gandhassa gandha iti

original: tassa samudāyagandhassa tathābhūte gandhe. Sarikkhaṃ sadisaṃ paṭidānaṃ etissāti sarikkhadānaṃ,
analyzed: tassa samudāya gandhassa tathābhūte gandhe sa rikkham sadisam paṭidānam etissa ati sa rikkha dānam

original: patthanā. Yathādhippetaphalāni sarikkhadānattāva adhippetaphalaṃ dentu, asarikkhadānaṃ
analyzed: patthanā yathā adhippeta phalāni adhippeta phalam dentu a sarikkha dānam

original: kathanti? Tampi detiyeva puññassa sabbakāmadadattāti āha “asarikkhadānampī”tiādi.
analyzed: katham ti tam pi detiyā iva puññassa āha a sarikkha dānam pi itiādi

original: Gandhabbakāyasaṃyuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: gandhabbakāyasaṃyutta vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 11. Valāhakasaṃyuttavaṇṇanā
analyzed: valāhakasaṃyutta vaṇṇanā

original: 550-606. Lokaṃ vālentā saṃvarantā chādentā ahanti pariyesantīti valāhā, devaputtā.
analyzed: lokam vālentā saṃvarantā chādentā ahanti pariyesanti iti valāhā deva puttā

original: Tesaṃ samūho valāhakadevakāyoti āha “valāhakakāyikā”tiādi. Sītakaraṇavalāhakāti sītaharaṇavalāhakā.
analyzed: tesam samūhaḥ āha valāhaka kāyikā atiādi sīta karaṇa valāhakā ati sīta haraṇa valāhakā

original: Sesapadesūti uṇhavalāhakādipadesu. Eseva nayoti “uṇhakaraṇavalāhakā”tiādinā attho
analyzed: sesa padesu iti uṇha valāhaka ādi padesu esā iva nayo ti uṇha karaṇa valāhaka ati ādinā attho

original: veditabbo. Cittaṭṭhapananti “sītaṃ hotū”ti evaṃ cittassa uppādanaṃ. Vassāneti vassakāle.
analyzed: veditabbaḥ citta ṭṭhapananti sītam hotu uti evam cittassa uppādanam vassāneti vassa kāle

original: Utusamuṭṭhānamevāti pākatikasītamevāti attho. Uṇhepīti uṇhakāle. Abbhamaṇḍapoti maṇḍapasadisaabbhapaṭalavitānamāha.
analyzed: utu samuṭṭhānam eva āti pākatika sītam eva āti attho uṇhe pi iti uṇha kāle abbha maṇḍapo ti maṇḍapa sadisa abbha paṭala vitānam āha

original: Abbhaṃ uppajjatīti tahaṃ tahaṃ paṭalaṃ uṭṭhahati. Abbheyevāti abbhakāle eva, vassāneti
analyzed: abbham uppajjati iti taham taham paṭalam uṭṭhahati abbheya iva ati abbha kāle eva vassāneti

original: attho. Atiabbhanti satapaṭalasahassapaṭalaṃ hutvā abbhuṭṭhānaṃ. Cittavesākhamāsesūti
analyzed: atthaḥ atiabbhanti sata paṭala sahassa paṭalam hutvā abbhuṭṭhānam citta vesākha māsesu iti

original: vasantakālaṃ sandhāyāha. Tadā hi viddho vigatavalāhako devo bhavituṃ yutto. Uttaradakkhiṇādīti
analyzed: vasanta kālam sandhāya āha tadā hi viddhaḥ vigata valāhakaḥ devaḥ bhavitum yuttaḥ uttara dakkhiṇa ādi iti

original: ādi-saddena pacchimavātādiṃ saṅgaṇhāti. Pakativātoti pakatiyā sabhāvena vāyanakavāto.
analyzed: ādi saddena pacchima vāta ādim saṅgaṇhāti pakati vāto ti pakatiyā sabhāvena vāyanaka vāto

original: Taṃ utusamuṭṭhānamevāti āhārūpajīvīnaṃ sattānaṃ sādhāraṇakammūpanissayautusamuṭṭhānameva.
analyzed: tam utu samuṭṭhānam eva ati āhāra upajīvīnam sattānam sādhāraṇa kamma upanissaya otu samuṭṭhānam eva

original: Esa nayo utusamuṭṭhānasītuṇhavātesupi. Tampi hi āhārūpajīvīnaṃ sattānaṃ sādhāraṇakammūpanissayamevāti.
analyzed: esa nayaḥ utu samuṭṭhāna sītuṇha vātesu pi tam pi hi āhāra upajīvīnam sattānam sādhāraṇa kamma upanissayam eva ati

original: Gītanti meghagītaṃ. Saccakiriyāyāti tādisānaṃ purisavisesānaṃ saccādhiṭṭhānena. Iddhibalenāti
analyzed: gītam ti megha gītam sacca kiriyāya ati tādisānam purisa visesānam sacca adhiṭṭhānena iddhi balena ati

original: iddhimantānaṃ iddhiānubhāvena. Vināsameghenāti kappavināsakameghena. Aññenapi kaṇhapāpikasattānaṃ
analyzed: iddhimantānam iddhi ānubhāvena vināsa meghena ati kappavināsaka meghena aññena api kaṇha pāpika sattānam

original: pāpakammapaccayā uppannavināsameghena vuṭṭhena so so deso vinassateva.
analyzed: pāpa kamma paccayā uppanna vināsa meghena vuṭṭhena saḥ saḥ desaḥ vinassatā iva

original: Valāhakasaṃyuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: valāhakasaṃyutta vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 12. Vacchagottasaṃyuttavaṇṇanā
607-661. Aññāṇāti aññāṇahetu, saccapaṭicchādakasammohahetūti attho. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
analyzed: aññāṇā ti aññāṇa hetu sacca paṭicchādaka sammoha hetu uti atthaḥ aṭṭhakathāyam

original: pana imameva atthaṃ hetuatthena karaṇavacanena dassetuṃ “aññāṇenā”ti vuttaṃ. Sabbānīti
analyzed: pana imam eva attham hetu atthena karaṇa vacanena dassetum aññāṇena ati vuttam sabbāni iti

original: “aññāṇā adassanā anabhisamayā”tiādīni padāni ekādasasu suttesu āgatāni, pañcapaññāsa

original: veyyākaraṇāni vuttāni suttesu pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ vasena veyyākaraṇassa āgatattā.
analyzed: veyyākaraṇāni vuttāni suttesu pañcannam khandhānam vasena veyyākaraṇassa āgata ttā

original: Vacchagottasaṃyuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: vacchagotta saṃyutta vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 13. Jhānasaṃyuttaṃ
analyzed: jhāna saṃyuttam

original: 1. Samādhimūlakasamāpattisuttavaṇṇanā
analyzed: samādhi mūlaka samāpatti sutta vaṇṇanā

original: 662. Samādhikusaloti samādhismiṃ kusalo. Tayidaṃ samādhikosallattaṃ saha jhānaṅgayogena
analyzed: samādhi kusalaḥ iti samādhismin kusalaḥ saha jhāna aṅga yogena

analyzed: catubbidhaḥ jhāna samādhi tasmā tam tam vibhāgam jānantassa siddham hoti iti āha paṭhamam

original: jhāna”ntiādi. Tattha vitakkavicārapītisukhekaggatāvasena paṭhamaṃ pañcaṅgikaṃ, pītisukhekaggatāvasena
analyzed: jhāna ntiādi tattha vitakka vicāra pīti sukha ikagga tā vasena paṭhamam pañcaṅgikam pīti sukha ekagga tā vasena

original: dutiyaṃ tivaṅgikaṃ, sukhekaggatāvasena tatiyaṃ duvaṅgikaṃ, upekkhekaggatāvasena catutthaṃ
analyzed: dutiyam tivaṅgikam sukha ikagga tā vasena tatiyam duvaṅgikam upekkhā ikagga tā vasena catuttham

original: duvaṅgikamevāti evaṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ jhāne taṃtaṃaṅgānaṃ vavatthāne kusalo. Samāpattikusaloti
analyzed: duvaṅgikam eva ati evam tasmin tasmin jhāne tad tad aṅgānam vavatthāne kusalaḥ samāpatti kusalaḥ iti

original: samāpajjane kusalo. Hāsetvāti tosetvā. Kallaṃ katvāti samādhānassa paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ
analyzed: samāpajjane kusalaḥ hāsetvā ati tosetvā kallam katvā ati samādhānassa paṭipakkha dhammānam

original: dūrīkaraṇena sahakārīkāraṇañca samādhānena samāpajjane cittaṃ samatthaṃ katvā. Sesapadānīti
analyzed: dūrīkaraṇena sahakārīkāraṇam ca samādhānena samāpajjane cittam samattham katvā sesa padāni iti

original: sesā tayo koṭṭhāsā. Tatiyādīsu nayesu akusalopi jhānatthāya paṭipannattā “jhāyītevā”ti vutto.
analyzed: sesā tayo koṭṭhāsā tatiya ādīsu nayesu akusalaḥ api jhāna atthāya paṭipanna ttā vutto

original: Samādhimūlakasamāpattisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: samādhi mūlaka samāpatti sutta vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: 2-55. Samādhimūlakaṭhitisuttādivaṇṇanā
663-716. Dutiyādisuttesu ṭhitikusaloti ettha antogadhahetuattho ṭhiti-saddo, tasmiñca
analyzed: dutiya ādi suttesu ṭhiti kusalo ti ettha antogadha hetu atthaḥ ṭhiti saddo tasmin ca

original: pana kusaloti atthoti āha – “jhānaṃ ṭhapetuṃ akusalo”ti. Sattaṭṭhaaccharāmattanti

original: sattaṭṭhaaccharāmattaṃ khaṇaṃ jhānaṃ ṭhapetuṃ na sakkoti adhiṭṭhānavasībhāvassa anipphāditattā.
analyzed: khaṇam jhānam ṭhapetum na sakkoti adhiṭṭhāna vasībhāvassa a nipphādita ttā

original: Yathāparicchedena kālena vuṭṭhātuṃ na sakkoti vuṭṭhānavasībhāvassa anipphāditattā.
analyzed: yathā a paricchedena kālena vuṭṭhātum na sakkoti vuṭṭhāna vasībhāvassa a nipphādita ttā

original: Kallaṃ jātaṃ assāti kallitaṃ, tasmiṃ kallite kallitabhāvena kasiṇārammaṇesu “idaṃ
analyzed: kallam jātam assa ati kallitam tasmin kallite kallita bhāvena kasiṇa ārammaṇesu idam

original: nāma asukassā”ti visayavasena samāpajjituṃ asakkonto na samādhismiṃ ārammaṇakusalo.
analyzed: nāma asukassa ati visaya vasena samāpajjitum a sakkontaḥ na samādhismim ārammaṇa kusalaḥ

original: Na samādhismiṃ gocarakusaloti samādhismiṃ nipphāditabbe tassa gocare kammaṭṭhānasaññite

original: pavattiṭṭhāne bhikkhācāragocare ca satisampajaññavirahito akusalo. Keci pana “kammaṭṭhānagocaro

original: paṭhamajjhānādikaṃ, ‘evaṃ samāpajjitabbaṃ, evaṃ bahulīkātabba’nti ajānanto tattha

original: akusalo nāmā”ti vadanti. Kammaṭṭhānaṃ abhinīharitunti kammaṭṭhānaṃ visesabhāgiyatāya
analyzed: akusalaḥ nāma ati vadanti kammaṭṭhānam abhinīharitun ti kammaṭṭhānam visesa bhāgiya tāya

original: abhinīharituṃ akusalo. Sakkaccakārīti cittīkārī. Sātaccakārīti niyatakārī. Samādhissa
analyzed: abhinīharitum akusalaḥ sakkacca kārī iti cittīkārī sātacca kārī iti niyata kārī samādhissa

original: upakārakadhammāti appanākosallā. Samāpattiādīhīti ādi-saddena sakkaccakāripadādīnaṃyeva

original: saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo catukkānaṃ vuttattā. Tenāha “yojetvā catukkā vuttā”ti. Lokiyajjhānavaseneva
analyzed: saṅgahaḥ daṭṭhabbaḥ catukkānam vutta ttā tena āha yojetvā catukkā vuttā iti lokiya jhāna vasena iva

original: kathitaṃ “samādhikusalo”tiādinā nayena desanāya pavattattā. Na hi lokuttaradhammesu

original: akosallaṃ nāma labbhati. Yadi akosallaṃ, na kusalasaddena visesitabbatā siyāti.
analyzed: akosallam nāma labbhati yadi akosallam na kusala saddena visesitabba tā siyāti

original: Samādhimūlakaṭhitisuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
Jhānasaṃyuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
analyzed: jhāna saṃyutta vaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā

original: Niṭṭhitā ca sāratthappakāsiniyā
analyzed: niṭṭhitā ca sārattha ppakāsiniyā

original: Saṃyuttanikāya-aṭṭhakathāya khandhavaggavaṇṇanā.
